name: Hardcore Cottagecore
description:
Mushroom meadow is being devastated by hundreds of drones who want to build another Amazon warehouse! It’s time for these fungi to fight back with wild auto-firing cottagecore abilities like spinning embrodery hoops and mason jar molotov cocktails! Choose your mushroom, go it solo or team up with your best bud, survive the horde and win back your turf! Get ready for a small co-op or solo dive into mushroom mayhem!
Features

  • Numerous unique and powerful abilities to destroy robots with
  • Cute cottagecore aesthetic
  • Quests to complete in each area
  • Play singleplayer or local 2-player co-op
  • Unlockable characters
  • Multiple areas
  • Full controller support or even play 2 players on a single keyboard
